function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Uneven distribution of health impacts in cities due to urban planning and interventions.","Impact":"Exacerbation of race, class, and gender-based dimensions of social inequality in cities.","Mitigation":"Incorporating equity considerations in urban planning and development, and prioritizing interventions to reduce health disparities.","Technologies":"Equity-focused urban planning tools, impact assessment frameworks.","People":"Residents of urban areas, especially those from marginalized communities.","Owner":"Urban planners, policymakers, and community leaders."},{"Description":"Potential for urban planning to be divisive in interpretations of appropriate spatial interventions, exacerbating social inequality.","Impact":"Unequal distribution of impacts of pandemics on health across human lives.","Mitigation":"Promoting inclusive decision-making processes in urban planning, and ensuring diverse stakeholder engagement in spatial interventions.","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, participatory design tools.","People":"Communities in urban areas, especially those with diverse socio-economic backgrounds.","Owner":"Urban planners, community leaders, and local authorities."},{"Description":"Risk of transmission and spread of Covid-19 and other pandemics in urban environments.","Impact":"Negative health outcomes for different people and communities due to disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Implementing public health measures, promoting vaccination, and enhancing sanitation and hygiene practices in urban settings.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, vaccination distribution systems, smart sanitation solutions.","People":"Residents of urban areas, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations.","Owner":"Health authorities, local governments, and public health agencies."}]}
